author.description:
designer who works in 2D > 4D ... 
p.i.x.e.l.l.a.r.e. is a digital project involving blahblah ... https://rc.xyz/pixellare

text: ever since I was a student, and got to know the wonderful and immense graphic work of Giovanni Pintori, I have always been obsessed with this work... after many years I have perhaps been able to quote him in my own way... c.i.a.o. *
